001package edu.pdx.cs410J.di;
002
003import com.google.inject.Inject;
004
005import javax.swing.*;
006
007/**
008 * A simple Java swing user interface for a Book Store application
009 */
010public class BookStoreGUI extends JFrame
011{
012    @Inject
013    public BookStoreGUI(CheckoutPanel checkout) {
014        super("Bookstore Terminal");
015
016        JTabbedPane tabs = new JTabbedPane( );
017        tabs.add( "Checkout", checkout );
018
019        this.add(tabs);
020    }
021}
